name: Offensive Cyber Tactics
description: Techniques for cyber attacks, penetration testing, and network exploitation.

cards.title: Advanced Exploitation Techniques
cards.description: Utilizing zero-day vulnerabilities and advanced hacking methods.
cards.bulletpoints: Exploit chaining, privilege escalation, persistence mechanisms
cards.summaryText: Chain fresh exploits to punch through modern defenses, escalate privileges immediately, and seed durable persistence so follow-on operators inherit full control.

cards.title: Command and Control (C2) Frameworks
cards.description: Using advanced C2 infrastructures for stealthy remote access.
cards.bulletpoints: Develop C2 infrastructure, evade detection, maintain persistence
cards.summaryText: Stand up resilient C2 channels with rotating infrastructure, shift traffic patterns to dodge detection, and quietly maintain access for long-haul operations.
